Uses of Interface
org.barghos.core.api.color.IColor4W

  • Packages that use IColor4W 
    Package Description
    org.barghos.core.api.color
    This package contains all interfaces for colors.
    org.barghos.core.color
    This package contains all basic implementations of LDR/HDR RGB/RGBA colors.

    • Uses of IColor4W in org.barghos.core.api.color

      Subinterfaces of IColor4W in org.barghos.core.api.color 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IHDRColor4W
      This interface allows for selective writing of only HDR-RGBA-Colors.
      interface  ILDRColor4W
      This interface allows for selective writing of only LDR-RGBA-Colors.
      Methods in org.barghos.core.api.color that return IColor4W 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IColor4W IColor4W.set(double scalar)
      Sets the rgba components to scalar.
      IColor4W IColor4W.set(double r, double g, double b, double a)
      Sets the rgba components to r, g, b and a.
      IColor4W IColor4W.set(int scalar)
      Sets the rgba components to scalar.
      IColor4W IColor4W.set(int r, int g, int b, int a)
      Sets the rgba components to r, g, b and a.
      IColor4W IColor4W.set(ITup4R t)
      Sets the rgba components to the values of t.
      IColor4W IColor4W.setA(int a)
      Set the alpha component to a.
      IColor4W IColor4W.setB(int b)
      Set the blue component to b.
      IColor4W IColor4W.setG(int g)
      Set the green component to g.
      IColor4W IColor4W.setR(int r)
      Set the red component to r.
      IColor4W IColor4W.setUnityA(double a)
      Set the alpha component to a.
      IColor4W IColor4W.setUnityB(double b)
      Set the blue component to b.
      IColor4W IColor4W.setUnityG(double g)
      Set the green component to g.
      IColor4W IColor4W.setUnityR(double r)
      Set the red component to r.
      default IColor4W IColor4W.setW(double w)
      Set the alpha component to w.
      default IColor4W IColor4W.setX(double x)
      Set the red component to x.
      default IColor4W IColor4W.setY(double y)
      Set the green component to y.
      default IColor4W IColor4W.setZ(double z)
      Set the blue component to z.
